title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Technology-Enhanced Effective Language Teaching Methodology Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve digital language expression skills by 20% using digital tools.
Learners receive and apply personalized feedback at least three times based on adaptive instructional methods.
Learners complete at least two creative language-based outputs through technology-mediated collaborative activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
